Changelog
=========

0.2.1 (2017-03-18)
------------------

* Added `configure.zcml` file to have registrations working.
* Fixed tests.


0.2 (2012-05-09)
----------------

* Updated to use the latest changes in `cromlech.browser`. The API is 
  unchanged but versions have been pinned down. Please check your versions
  before updating.


0.1 (2012-01-20)
----------------

* Initial release : forked out of ``dolmen.app.breadcrumbs``.
